name: Pandu Pandas
description: Meet Pandu — your AI friend who’s always by your side. Talk with him in real time through text or voice, share your thoughts, ask questions, or just enjoy a casual conversation. Whether you’re looking for advice, company, or simply someone to listen, Pandu is here as a true companion you can connect with anytime. Pandu unites real-time conversation, creative generation, and future-ready AI systems — all powered by next-gen technology.
